talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The ice comes from the <clr:0000>icehouse north
of town<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>They gather the snowmelt from the
Gerudo Highlands to make the ice there.<sp:5:0:0>
It really brings out the flavor of the drink!
But the deliveries have slowed down
lately. I wonder if the higher temperatures
in the desert have anything to do with it...
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Well? <sp:5:0:0>What are you thinking?


Only <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for another glass of
<clr:0000>Noble Pursuit<clr:ffff>. How about it? Want to
gulp down another one?
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I'm surprised to be serving drinks to a
voe... But I should embrace new things,
shouldn't I? A true "Noble Pursuit"!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Sarqso. Come back soon.


<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm running low on ice though... Where is the latest
ice delivery?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Anche from the icehouse asked me to
pass along a warm sarqso to you.

She was looking quite pleased when I
saw her. You really know how to make
a vai smile, huh?
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:TalkPositive_01>Ooh,<sp:5:0:0> you must be the voe everyone's
been talking about.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, normally I wouldn't have anything
for youngsters like you, but...

I've heard a new vai is going to be coming
to town sometime soon, and that news
sparked a fire in me!
I came up with a <clr:0000>special version<clr:ffff> of my
signature drink. It's one everybody,
from vehvi to vaba, can enjoy!
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>However...I can't get my hands on what
I need to make it while we're stuck here.
And I don't want to forget the <clr:0000>recipe<clr:ffff>...
Hmph. When is this <clr:0000>sand shroud <clr:ffff>going to
clear up, anyway?
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>That reminds me...<sp:5:0:0> I'd heard a new vai
would be coming to town. Oh, I mean in
addition to Aaqlet.
I haven't seen her though. I guess she
hasn't arrived yet...

<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>Supposedly she's coming here from a
place called <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder how far
away that is...
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>I've heard a new vai is going to be coming
to town sometime soon, and that news
sparked a fire in me!
I came up with a special version of my
signature drink. It's one everybody,
from vehvi to vaba, can enjoy!
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>However...I can't get my hands on what
I need to make it while we're stuck here.
I want to go back up aboveground...
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Mattison asked me to give you a warm
sarqso if you stopped by.

She was looking really happy when I
saw her. You really know how to make
a vai smile, huh?
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Well... It's not like we can welcome a new
vai to town when this sand shroud is
covering everything, anyway...
Ugh, and I worked so hard to come up
with a <clr:0000>special version<clr:ffff>...

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>However... I can't get my hands on what
I need to make it while we're stuck here.
And I don't want to forget the <clr:0000>recipe<clr:ffff>...
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I heard all about what you did, voe.<sp:5:0:0>
They're saying you fought to save
the town.
You and your thin frame have more than
exceeded my expectations. Well done!

Because of you, I was able to return to my
canteen.<sp:5:0:0> Sarqso.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Let me offer you something for all your
help—the first drink is on the house!

From vehvi to vaba, everyone can enjoy
the special version of my signature drink,
<clr:0000>Noble Pursuit<clr:ffff>!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Here. This is my way of saying thanks for
helping out Anche. My treat.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_00>What? Really?<sp:5:0:0> You're not an easy one to
convince, I guess.

Well, that's OK. Come back if you find
yourself suddenly craving the drink
I promised!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>A side of sarqso makes the drink all
the better, doesn't it?
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sure thing! <sp:5:0:0>Oh, hang on. You need to
make some room in your bag before I can
give this to you.
You can't fit anything more in a bag that
full, no matter how hard you try.
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>...Oh, hang on. You need to make some
room in your bag before I can give this
to you.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even if you were planning on drinking it
right away, it's best to have some space
free. That's just a good habit to get into.
I'll hold on to this drink for you until then.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Ha! I like your energy. Give me just one
second here...
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Oops, hold on... <sp:5:0:0>You're a little short on
rupees there.

Maybe it's a voe custom to drink now,
pay later, but that's not the case here.<sp:5:0:0>
Come back when you've saved up a little!
talk0007: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_00>Here you go.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry for the wait.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Well? <sp:5:0:0>What are you thinking?


Only <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for a glass of <clr:0000>Noble
Pursuit<clr:ffff>. How about it? Want to gulp
one down?
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It took some serious work, but I'm really
proud of the special version of Noble
Pursuit that I came up with!
I was inspired when I heard that a new
vai was going to be coming to town...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>The drink is full of all the vitamins and
minerals you need to take on a harsh
desert day. It'll really boost your energy!
If you like it, by all means come back and
get some more.<sp:5:1:0> Oh, but only the first one
is free.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I'll be happy to make another for you in
the future, but it'll cost <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I put my all into making this new version
of my signature drink when I heard the vai
was coming. I hope you'll support it too!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I run a business and have my reputation
to consider. I won't back down until I've
settled the debt I owe you!
How about it?<sp:5:0:0> Will you let me treat you
to a drink this time?
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I'm happy to see you again.


My <clr:0000>Noble Pursuit<clr:ffff>, chilled to the perfect
temperature using <clr:0000>special, locally sourced
ice<clr:ffff>, will keep you cool in the desert.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Only <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for a glass.<sp:5:0:0> How about it?
Want to gulp one down?
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>You must be the voe everyone has been
talking about.

I heard that I could return to my canteen
because of you and the chief.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Let me offer you something for all your
help—the first drink is on the house!

From vehvi to vaba, everyone can enjoy
the special version of my signature drink,
<clr:0000>Noble Pursuit<clr:ffff>!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>I'm happy to see you again.


My <clr:0000>Noble Pursuit<clr:ffff>, chilled to the perfect
temperature using <clr:0000>special, locally sourced
ice<clr:ffff>, is ideal for fighting off the heat.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Only <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for a glass.<sp:5:0:0> How about it?
Want to gulp one down?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Mattison wanted me to give this to you.<sp:5:0:0>
I think she's gonna grow up to be a
fine vai.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My signature drink, <clr:0000>Noble Pursuit<clr:ffff>...


It's full of all the vitamins and minerals
you need to take on a harsh desert day.
It'll really boost your energy!
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And I even incorporate <clr:0000>special, locally
sourced ice<clr:ffff> into the recipe. It makes the
drink cool and refreshing!
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Only <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> for a glass.<sp:5:0:0> How about it?
Want to gulp one down?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's a real treat, if I do say so myself.
The key is including the <clr:0000>special, locally
sourced ice<clr:ffff>.
